reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Great quality comforter for a decent price. The comforter is large, fluffy, and soft. Plus I really love the dark green color. I paired with flannel sheets for the winter months and I’m loving it so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful & luxury comfort
reviews.reviewText: I love changing my bedding for the seasons, I wanted something that was beautiful and comforting for cold winter nights. I live in the country so Amazon is my go to for finding items I need. I searched for a few nights and came across the comforter and thought it looked like a comfortable bedding. I am delighted to say not only is it beautiful and well made, but it is so comfortable with the Sherpa against your skin!!! So nice and warm! I found my kitty loving the new comforter so yep…. Cat approved!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, decently fluffy without being too bulky
reviews.reviewText: We've enjoyed the comforter so far! It's heavy enough and fluffy enough to be warm and comforting but not too bulky that you feel like you are drowning and lost in it. It was easy to wash and dry and did not lose form, shape, filling, or color after washing. For it's size and quality, this comforter was a really good deal. We've paid a lot more for comforters that weren't quite as nice as this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as expected
reviews.reviewText: I was expecting one side to be almost quilt like, but both sides were very fuzzy and could barely see the pattern but it was soft and looked warm so it was fine. As soon as I opened the packaging it smelled horrible, like the chemical factory smell. I read the tag and followed washing instructions in cold water and as soon as I took it out of the dryer the bedspread was ruined. It has several hard and bunches spots and looks terrible on the bed and like I've had it for years even though I never used it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love but HOT
reviews.reviewText: I love the softness, the color, the seeming weight, honestly almost everything… except, it is the hottest comforters I have ever had…. Wish it breathed a little better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this comforter!!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the Dark Olive Green. I’m sorta picky when it comes to my sleeping comforter due to the fact that I do not like being hot. But I love to be covered by a blanket. I absolutely love that it’s double sided. One side being fluffy and super soft. The other side is breathable. It’s perfect. Not thin, great quality. LOVE LOVE LOVE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Man wish I woulda bought this a while ago! Finally went on sale but it is way worth the cost! So comfy! And fluffy! The color is just as amazing as you’d think!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s the softest comforter I’ve ever slept under ❤️
reviews.reviewText: It was better than it was described, over sized and so comfortable! It looks better than the picture, I would definitely recommend

reviews.reviewTitle: Super soft on your skin and fits perfectly
reviews.reviewText: I love absolutely everything , it's very comfortable and very nice once you hop in bed it will be very hard to want to get up in the morning because it's just that cozy and soft .
So soft, warm, comfy and the colour is great. Quality materials and make. Will be looking at this company for our spare bedroom bedding as well. We got the King Cal in Olive. 😍😍😍😍

The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is the thickness of the comforter. I really was hoping for something a little thicker and fluffier, purely for aesthetic reasons, but it is still a very nice comforter set for the price. The material is very soft against my skin and it is keeping me warm now that the temperature has dropped and Canadian winter has finally kicked in. Colour is as shown in the pictures, I chose "brown". It's not a rich brown but that was obvious from the product photos. It's more of a soft pastel, dusty kind of brown, which is nice. I usually go with darker colours but I'm trying something new and I'm not disappointed! I really do wish it wasn't so flat looking though, since I'm trying to achieve a nice cozy look. Some more pronounced tufts would probably remedy the fullness issue and bring this comforter to the next level.

Love this set! Very cozy and not too hot. I like that it has a cotton type backing on it. Very large and hard to fit in my large capacity washing machine, and takes quite a few cycles in thw dryer. Hope it holds up! Matches the dog fur perfectly

reviews.reviewerName: JJ loves cats (^.^) The Cat Dad
reviews.reviewText: this comforter is very soft and was nice and warm over the minus 50 celcius alberta got last weekend its got fluffy soft sherpa on one side with is really nice one the body side its reversible and looks amazing on my bed and a nice big comforter my cat loves it so much apparantly the i used when she was a kitten is no longer good enough for her lol she even kneeds it and grooms it like another cat also i love the comforter :)
